title: Mazhai Mazhai Lyrics Moondru Per Moondru Kadhal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Mazhai Mazhai
Singers: Karthik, Shwetha
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics : Na Muthu Kumar
Movie: Moondru Per Moondru Kadhal

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai
ennai mattum ninaikum mazhai
vittu vittu thurathum mazhai
penney neethaan en mazhai

Naan unnai paartha naaliley
jannal thaandi peidhadhu mazhai
nee ennai paartha naaliley
minnal minni vandhadhu mazhai

Azhai azhai ena thaakudhey
mazhai thaakudhey mazhai thaakudhey
Ninai ninai ena ketkudhey
manam ketkudhey haiyo...

Anai anai ena kenjudhey
uyir kenjudhey uyir kunjudhey
adikoru murai konjudhey
unnai konjudhey haiyo...

Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai
ennai mattum ninaikum mazhai
vittu vittu thurathum mazhai
penney neethaan en mazhai

Mutham kettaal, vetkam tharuven
vetkam ketaal, vannam tharuven
kaathu kidandhaal, mella varuven
thookam keduthu, thollai tharuven

Kanavil thottaal, thalli viduven
neril thottaal, killi viduven
nee adangaadha en raatchasy

Poigal sonnaal, vaadi viduven
meendum sonnaal, odi viduven
mazhaiyil vandhaal, kudaigal tharuven
madiyil vandhaal, kori viduven
kenji ketaal, konjam varuven
konji ketaal, konjam tharuven
nee ennai kollum vana dhevadhai

Nee un paadhayai en paarvayil thaedinaai
naan enmeedhile kandaen ena koovinen

nenjam ennum theevukkuley kadhal pookal
vaanum mannum theeyum neerum
neeyum naanum kadhalaagi meviyaada..

Kadhal endraal, chella paarvai
aasai endraal, kalla paarvai
oodal endraal, konjam kobam
kobam endraal, meendum modhal

thaedal endraal, unnil ennai
thaedi vandhaal, thozhaiyum penmai
naam thozhaindhaalum sugam thaanadi

Thayakam endraal, idhalil nadanam
mayak endraal, manadhin nadanam
kirakam endraal, kannin nadanam
kalakkam endraal,
viruppam endraal vizhiyin nadanam
nerukkam endraal, viralin nadanam
ini nerungaamal neruppilaye

Nee ennakkaagave uruvaanaval snegidhi
en edhirkaalathin mugam thaanadi kanmani

netrai kondru, indrai vendru naalai seidhaal
unnai thottu ennai thottu
kadhalaagi enna pesum
eera kaatru ..

Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai Mazhai
ennai mattum ninaikum mazhai
vittu vittu thurathum mazhai
penney neethaan en mazhai

Naan unnai paartha naaliley
jannal thaandi peidhadhu mazhai
nee ennai paartha naaliley
